sentences.en: I guess he is a business tenderfoot.
sentences.cn: 我猜想他是生意场上的新手.

sentences.en: I may look like a tenderfoot, but I think I can follow a trail or carry a pack if necessary.
sentences.cn: 我也许看起来像个新手，不过有必要的话我认为我也能跟着上路或扛包。

trans.tran_cn: <美，非正>新手，初学者，<美>（拓荒地等的）新来者，新参加的童子军
trans.tran_en: A tenderfoot is a newcomer to a place or activity, especially a newcomer to the mines or ranches of the western United States
